title: PowerShell Training
description: Powershell training offered by Mindmajix allows you to automate various maintenance and administration tasks. During this training, you will get complete knowledge of PowerShell scripting. This course enables you to learn various concepts like fundamentals of PowerShell, building blocks of PowerShell, shell script, etc. Training on PowerShell makes you manage different Microsoft products like SQL, Azure. This training prepares you for clearing the PowerShell certification exam.
prerequisites: What are the Prerequisites for PowerShell Course?As PowerShell deals with Microsoft products, basic knowledge of those products is required for attending the PowerShell course.
instructor_bio: Shinish has got 14+ years of industrial experience working for global MNCs. He chose to deliver online training and contribute informative articles and blogs to various websites to share his technical expertise.
review|1|review: I Just completed my PowerShell Training from mindmajix technologies. It was a good learning experience. The trainer is a real-time industry expert. The trainer is very passionate about the subject and lead me with real time scenarios which are helpful during my interview process.
review|2|review: I want to recommend Mindmajix if anyone is looking for the PowerShell Training. My experience is good with the PowerShell course that I opted for. The trainer is technically good and gave all assist required during the tenure.
review|3|review: As soon as I search for PowerShell Training on google I found Mindmajix, enrolling for the course was an easy task, got continuous support from the trainer for the queries i had. Thanks for the support and i recommend highly mindmajix for online training seekers.
content: ['Getting started with Windows PowerShell', 'Setting Up the Environment', 'Syntax of PowerShell', 'Cmdlets for Administration', 'Working with the Windows PowerShell Pipeline', 'Understanding How the Pipeline Works', 'Using PSProviders and PSDrives', 'Working with Variables, Arrays, and Hash Tables', 'Basic Scripting', 'Advanced Scripting', 'Administering Remote Computers', 'Getting into the real-life examples of scripting.', 'Practice Test & Interview Questions']
short_description: Get in-depth knowledge of task automation and configuration management with the Powershell certification course.
